definition: to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary

sentences.english: There are two kinds of reserviors consisting of clastics and carbonates in Yakela Black.
sentences.chinese: 雅克拉断凸储层主要有碎屑岩和碳酸盐岩两大类。

sentences.english: Clastic facies pattern recognition is somewhat systematic .
sentences.chinese: 碎屑岩相模式的识别是带有一定系统性的。

sentences.english: Aim To study the secondary porosity in the clastic rock storage of Ordos Basin.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究鄂尔多斯盆地碎屑岩储集体中的次生孔隙。

sentences.english: Oil and gas accumulation in Guang'an is a hot point of oil and gas exploration in Sichuan at present.
sentences.chinese: 广安地区碎屑岩油气藏是目前勘探开发的热点。

sentences.english: Two reservoir types are detrital reservoir rock and carbonate reservoir rock.
sentences.chinese: 塔东地区储层类型包括碎屑岩和碳酸盐岩两大类。

sentences.english: The clastic rocks widespread in the Triassic Xikang Group in western Sichuan consist dominantly of turbiditic flysch formations.
sentences.chinese: 三叠系西康群碎屑岩主体为一套浊积岩复理石建造。

sentences.english: There is a close relation between the terrigenous clastic rock and the plate tectonics.
sentences.chinese: 陆源碎屑岩特征与板块构造性质有着密切关系。

sentences.english: Carboniferous siliciclastic rocks in Tazhong area, Tarim Basin are good reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 塔中地区石炭系碎屑岩是优质储层。

sentences.english: The geochemical characterizes of metamorphic detrital rock show their source rocks were terrigenous detrital rocks .
sentences.chinese: 岩石的地球化学特征表明其原岩为一套陆源碎屑岩。

definition: Ordovician system (geology)/see 奧陶紀|奥陶纪
Silurian system (geology)/see 志留紀|志留纪
